Climacteric Period Syndrome


Climacteric period syndrome that is the amenorrhea period of women over fifty are forthcoming, accompany with endocrine disturbance and disorder of autonomic nerve and feel unwell. The light and serious of this syndrome are different from person to person. A great many people will emerge those syndrome such as menstrual disorder restlessness and tantrum, pyretic sweating, palpitation and insomnia, dizziness and tinnitus, morbid forgetfulness and Suspiciousness, cacesthesia, and so on. TCM holds that are caused by yin asthenia of concepion meridian, declension of taichong channel, deficiency of vital energy, imbalance of Yin and Yang.

Acupoints for Climacteric period syndrome
Baihui, Taiyang, Yingtang, Fengchi, Qihai, Guanyuan, Fengfu, Dazhui,
Tianzhong: On the scapula, in the depression of the centre of the subscapular fossa.
Pishu, Shenshu, Sanyinjiao, Taichong.

Cupping Treatment of Common Disease -Hordeolum


TCM holds that this disease is caused by wind-evil, could transmit heat of eyelids, the wind-heat turn the body fluid to ulcer; or have ate to much hot and stir-frying food lead the spleen and stomach accumulate wet heat so qi and blood stagnation stay the meridian of skin of eyelids. Recurrent attacks are caused by the remnant evil and lurking toxic heat or weakness of body.

The location and method of cupping.
Selecting acupoints: Yangbai, Yingtang, Taiyang, ShenZhu, Xinshu, Ganshu, Quchi, Hegu.

The method of cupping:
Cupping cup: use put fire into the cup and cupping after flash of fire to suck the Dazhui, Yingtang, Taiyang, Hegu, Quchi, or use cupping method of air pump to suck above acupoints.
Acucupping: use needle to prick Dazhui, Fengmen, Feishu, Ganshu, Hegu, after have feeling use cupping cup and cupping method of air pump to suck these acupoints.

Cupping of venesection: disinfect Dazhui, Ganshu, Xinshu, Quchi, Yangbai, use three edge needle to prick above acupoints for 2-3 times, then use cupping after flash of fire to suck pricked site until have a litter blood.

Treatment to Common Disease with Guasha -Spontaneous Perspir

It is caused by imbalance of YIN and YANG. Spontaneous perspiration is not influenced by environment; sufferer sweat all the time in daytime, especially after exercise. Night sweat means sweating in night; it stops when you wake up. Qi deficiency leads spontaneous perspiration while asthenic yin causing excessive pyrexia leads to night sweat.

Guasha treatment to spontaneous perspiration and night sweat: first, we select acupoints on the back, dazhui is below the spinous process of the 7th cervical vertebra; feishu is 1.5 cun lateral to the lower borer of the spinous process of the 3rd thoracic vertebra; xinshu is below the spinous process of the 5th thoracic vertebra, 1.5 cun lateral to the posterior midline; pishu is below the spinous process of the l1th thoracic vertebra, 1.5 cun lateral to the posterior midline.

Treatment to Common Disease with Guasha -Cautions


1. If patients are scraping indoor, we should pay attention to keep warm, especially in the winter to avoid getting cold.
2. You must clean the skin before scraping, and the strigil must be disinfected.
3. When scraping, force of scraping must be moderate, not too strong or fierce.
4. You should select acupoints according to meridian; each site should be scraped in 1-5 minutes. If fail to scrap Sha, do not force it out.
5. The sufferers had better to drink a cup of boiled water after scraping so as to supply the body fluids and to improve qi and blood circulation and metabolism. Especially, you should pay more attention to those who are more serious, those who need surgery, and those who have serious heart disease. They are not allowed to be scraped.

If the skin is damaged or burnt, do not scrap on it. Those who are stimulating, too full, do not be scraped, as well as those who stop exercise just a moment.

Main Points of Guasha Operation and Some Treatment to Common


Main points:

Tools:
Tools include strigil, promoting blood flow preparation, cleaning tissue paper, cotton ball with alcohol.

Two kinds of strigil:
One is made of buffalo horn, another one is made from jade. This is buffalo horn strigil, which is common used in clinical treatment. It has two sides, one thick and another thin. We use the thick one to prevention Guasha and the thin one to treatment Guasha.
This is jade strigil.
This is promoting blood flow preparation which is also called shin- scraping oil. It was extracted by lubricating oil and Chinese herb which has the function of improving meridian, relieving swelling.
This is cleaning tissue paper and this is alcohol cotton ball.

Method of operation: method of operation is the key part of Guasha treatment. Whether you master skillfully or not will influence the therapeutic effect directly.
It includes four methods: kneading, teasing, relieving and scraping.
Following are introduction to kneading and scraping which are frequently used.

Kneading? that is operator clenches half fist with the first knuckle of index dipping in water, then kneads the acupoint.

Scraping? Modern scraping is developing through research, improvement, innovation, based on the traditional methods.
Generally speaking, scraping and pressing meridian are done by turns. Operator should master how to hold the strigil, scraping angle, intensity, scraping direction of each site and reinforcing and reducing method.
Generally speaking, when doing scraping, operator holds the strigil, scrapes moderately, from up to down or from middle to both sides.

Reinforcing and reducing method.

When doing Guasha, operator makes sure the pathogenetic condition, then reinforces and reduces according to the principle.
Reinforcing and reducing method depends on the scraping pressure, speed, time, and direction.
One, scraping pressure: light pressure is reinforcing, heavy pressure is reducing.
Two, scraping speed: slow, reinforcing while fast speed is reducing.
Three, scraping time: long time is reinforcing, short time is reducing.
Four, scraping direction: scraping towards meridian is reinforcing, scraping against meridian is reducing.

Cyclical Flowing and Distribution of The Twelve Meridians


Hand-sanyin originates from chest and emerges from hand; hand-sanyang originates from hand and emerges from head; foot-sanyang originates from head and emerges from foot; foot-sanyin originates from and enters viscera.

Reinforcing: Reinforce the weak people
When doing reinforcing, scraping should be soft, slow, short, and runs towards meridian.

Reducing: reduce the strong people
When doing reducing, scraping should be heavy, fast, long, and runs against meridian.

Moderate reinforcing and reducing method lie between reinforcing and reducing. In clinical treatment, it is applicable to viscera disease, weak and strong inclusion or confusion, qi and blood disorder so that regulars yin and yang. Generally, moderate reinforcing and reducing is commonly used in Guasha prevention with no sha or light sha.

Sha: There are many red sporadic and granuliform spot or large lamellar red, which we called it “Sha”. The symptom of disease is according to the degree of Sha.?Those who have light disease will appear red or lamellar sha, while the serious will appear violet red or lump sha, it is even has blood bladder. There are no sha appear if people are health.

The location and the degree of sha are consistent with the part of body and the degree of pathogenetic condition. A great many people feel thermy and heat, cleanlily, and the abnormal feeling decrease and disappear, while joint range of motion increase.

Methods: scrape once every other day or two days for general disease after the Sha disappears. One treatment includes five times. Before next treatment, you should have a rest for four to six days. Most sufferers will be healed after scraped five to ten times.

Treatment to Common Disease with Guasha-Lumbago


That is one side or two sides of low back pain. It’s has common seen that soft tissue of low back injury, lumbar muscle strain, or affection of rachiopathy, and so on.

TCM classify it into three kinds as following:
1. Cold-damp lumbago: this sufferer are most have case history of cold hygrosis, low back pain and activity are inconvenient. The pain sometimes is seriously, which from low back to lower limps.
2. Low back pain for old age: this sufferer have case history of traumatic disease, the pain will intensify when the patient are very tired and the pain site are uncertain. Low back are intensify and aching pain with congestion.
3. Lumbago due to deficiency of the kidney: this sufferer has chronic onset, slightly pain, languor, knees are weak, coldness of legs, with yellow urina and feel upset.
